short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed up the search in Kibana. Search for a selected parameter in a new background tab in the context of the current search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of inflexible filtering in Kibana? This add-on adds new options for quickly setting up and adding filters in new tabs.
